values.title: BEING EXPERT
values.description: You like being known as someone with special knowledge or skills.

values.title: FAST PACE
values.description: You enjoy working rapidly at a high pace.

values.title: MONEY
values.description: Earning a large amount of money is important to you.

values.title: PRESSURE
values.description: You like working to deadlines.

values.title: WORK ALONE
values.description: You like to work on your own.

values.title: COMPETITION
values.description: You enjoy competing against other people or groups.

values.title: PRECISE WORK
values.description: You like working on things which involve great care and concentration.

values.title: ARTISTIC
values.description: You enjoy making music, making designs, writing poetry, making models etc.

values.title: PHYSICAL CHALLENGE
values.description: You enjoy doing something that is physically demanding.

values.title: A WELL-KNOWN ORGANISATION
values.description: You like being part of a well-known organisation.

values.title: STATUS
values.description: You enjoy being in a position which leads other people to respect you.

values.title: VARIETY
values.description: You enjoy having lots of different things to do.

values.title: ROUTINE
values.description: You like having a routine which is fairly predictable.

values.title: CONTACT WITH PEOPLE
values.description: You enjoy having a lot of contact with people.

values.title: TIME FREEDOM
values.description: You prefer to decide how to use your own time, rather than having a rigid daily routine.

values.title: COMMUNICATION
values.description: You enjoy being able to express ideas or feelings to other people.

values.title: PERSUADING PEOPLE
values.description: You enjoy persuading people to buy something or change their minds about something.

values.title: PROMOTION
values.description: You like to work where there is a good chance of promotion.

values.title: SECURITY
values.description: It is important to know your work will always be there for you.

values.title: FRIENDSHIP
values.description: You would or do like close friendships with people at work.

values.title: SUPERVISION
values.description: You enjoy being responsible for work done by others.

values.title: RISK
values.description: You like to take risks.

values.title: RECOGNITION
values.description: You do like people to appreciate you for the work you do.

values.title: HELP SOCIETY
values.description: You like to think that your work is producing something worthwhile for society.

values.title: PLACE OF WORK
values.description: It is important that you work in the right part of the country for you.

values.title: EXCITEMENT
values.description: It is important for you to have a lot of excitement in your work.

values.title: MAKING DECISIONS
values.description: It is important to you to have to make decisions about how things should be done, who should do it and when it should be done.

values.title: CHALLENGE
values.description: You enjoy being 'stretched' and given new problems to work on.

values.title: HELPING OTHERS
values.description: It is important to you to help other people either individually or in groups, as part of your work.

values.title: COMMUNITY
values.description: You like to live in a place where you can get involved in the community.

values.title: INDEPENDENCE
values.description: You like being able to work in the way you want, without others telling you what to do.

values.title: WORK WITH OTHERS
values.description: You like to work in a team alongside others.

values.title: PEACE
values.description: You prefer to have few pressures and uncomfortable demands.

values.title: LEARNING
values.description: It is important for you to learn new things.

values.title: CREATIVITY
values.description: Thinking up new ideas and ways of doing things is important to you.
